record.field: 1. In _______ Survey, all employee of a department are given a questionnaire that lists the tasks and asks them to rate each task depending upon its importance & their interest in getting some more training on it.
2. Competencies that you want your team to achieve should be carefully - i) identified; ii) verified; iii) made public in advance; iv) scanned.
3. Which of the following type of training needs assessment programme is the characteristics of fewer people involved and short term focus?
4. ________ who conduct the appraisal must be able to observe the behaviour they are rating.
5. Which one of the following period brings with the search for work and includes getting your first job?
6. ______ argue that, Self-raters review themselves more leniently than their managers and present themselves in highly favorable light?

ol.li: A combination of abstract conceptualization and active experimentation;
A combination of concrete experience and reflective observation;
A combination of abstract conceptualization and reflective observations;
A combination of concrete experience and active experimentation; match with the i] Convergent; ii] Accommodative; iii] Assimilation; iv] Divergent.

record.field: 8. Which of the following is important to make learning process more interesting rather then relevance and meaning?
D. Emotions attached to the material taught
9. _______ reveals multiple needs that management and HR professions have to identify and prioritize.
10. Which of the following framework built upon Kirkpatricks approach, expand focus of evaluation beyond measuring post program effectiveness?

field.name: description
field.p: i] Philips five level ROI framework;

record.field: 11. _________ is a valuable tool for collecting person analysis data?

field.name: description
field.p: can be a potential tool with
i] Potential to align a firm's employees with its corporate strategies;
iii] Giving individuals the skills they need to think strategically;
iv] Influencing and changing the way knowledge is delivered to employee
